@graph.name: French Bread Pizza - Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: This vegan French bread pizza is incredibly delicious, crunchy, and ready in only 15 minutes! Perfect for quick weeknight dinners!

@graph.headline: French Bread Pizza
@graph.keywords: baguette pizza,baguette pizza recipe,French bread pizza,French bread pizza with vegetables,French bread pizza with veggies,pizza baguette,pizza baguette recipe,vegan pepperoni pizza,vegan pizza,vegan pizza buns,vegan pizza with pepperoni,vegan veggie pizza

@graph.name: Vegan French Bread Pizza
@graph.description: This vegan French bread pizza is incredibly delicious, crunchy, and ready in only 15 minutes! Perfect for quick weeknight dinners!
recipeIngredient: 1/2  red bell pepper, cut into small pieces
1/2  yellow bell pepper, cut into small pieces
about 6  mushrooms, cut into small pieces
1/4 cup vegan pepperoni, cut into small pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 °F. Cut the baguette buns or the French baguette lengthwise into halves.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 °F. Cut the baguette buns or the French baguette lengthwise into halves.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, combine the tomato sauce, basil, oregano, garlic, and season with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, combine the tomato sauce, basil, oregano, garlic, and season with salt and pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon on the tomato sauce, sprinkle with vegan cheese, and place the toppings on the French bread pizza. Bake for 8 minutes. Serve with a green salad.
recipeInstructions.name: Spoon on the tomato sauce, sprinkle with vegan cheese, and place the toppings on the French bread pizza. Bake for 8 minutes. Serve with a green salad.
